actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department; OMB.

official_title: A bill to transfer the National Institute of Mental Health to the National Institutes of Health.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to make the National Institute of Mental Health a division of the National Institutes of Health (currently within the Alcohol, Drug Abuse, and Mental Health Administration).

titles.title: A bill to transfer the National Institute of Mental Health to the National Institutes of Health.
